entry.title: SPECIAL AIR QUALITY STATEMENT, Burns Lake
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 3:35 p.m. PDT Thursday 6 April 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Chance of rain showers or wet flurries. Low plus 1. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 60 percent chance of rain showers or wet flurries. Wind southeast 20 km/h becoming light this evening. Low plus 1. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PDT Thursday 6 April 2023

entry.title: Friday: Chance of rain showers or wet flurries. High 8. POP 60%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. 60 percent chance of rain showers or wet flurries in the morning. Wind becoming southwest 20 km/h late in the morning. High 8. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PDT Thursday 6 April 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Chance of rain showers or wet flurries. Low minus 5. POP 30%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. 30 percent chance of rain showers or wet flurries in the evening. Wind southwest 20 km/h becoming light in the evening. Low minus 5. Wind chill minus 7 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PDT Thursday 6 April 2023
